text: The President of the Republic of Malawi is the head of state and head of government of Malawi. The president leads the executive branch of the Government of Malawi and is the commander-in-chief of the Malawian Defence Force. ==Monarch (1964–1966)== The succession to the throne was the same as the succession to the British throne. No. Monarch Portrait Reign Royal House Prime Minister No. Monarch Portrait Reign start Royal House Prime Minister Reign end Time in office 1 Queen Elizabeth II 1964 1966 2 years Windsor Banda ===Governor-General=== The Governor-General was the representative of the monarch in Malawi and exercised most of the powers of the monarch. The Governor-General was appointed for an indefinite term, serving at the pleasure of the monarch. After the passage of the Statute of Westminster 1931, the Governor-General was appointed solely on the advice of the Cabinet of Malawi without the involvement of the British government.
